data.description:
A guild about adult visual artworks and animations made by fans. Content relating cartoons, comics, anime, light novel, manga, manhwa, manhua, web comics, etc are highly welcome. Put [OC] in the title if you are the creator of the artwork.

Rules:

1)Put the source of the artwork in the comments if you are not the original creator. Also try to mention the series of the characters belong to if applicable.

2)Put [OC] in the title if you are the creator of the artwork. 

3)Be courteous and do not insult, harass, kinkshame or belittle other users. 

4)No sexualized loli or shota content as per Ruqqus's rules

5)Follow the Ruqqus rules and guidelines

data.description:
##### Actual Occult Guild

No Twitter Baby Witches, no pretentiousness, just you and the Universe.
Nothing posted here is intending to violate any Law.

- Refrain from layish behaviour
- Occultism is by default right leaning, however no Political Content
- NO Conspiracy Content
- NSFW and the likes is allowed, please tag it
- This is no place to convert, belittle, or degrade someone for their practices or beliefs
- Due to ruqqus being small and new, new Threads should have some flesh, write some 
  sentences, post a pic, link something, reply to comments etc.
- Tag me if you like to talk about LoA or Celtic Paganism

See the sister page +Witchcraft



###### Looking for high-quality non-political Guilds? 
See +GuildsOfSubstance, a growing list of worthwhile Ruqqus non-political Guilds.
data.description_html:
Actual Occult Guild

No Twitter Baby Witches, no pretentiousness, just you and the Universe. Nothing posted here is intending to violate any Law.

  • Refrain from layish behaviour

data.description:
Are you a single man? Do you enjoy the single life? This sub is for you! Here is a place to discuss men's issues, single life, hobbies, fitness, style, independence, sex, and more...

1. Keep the hate and angst to a minimum. Any mentions of female nature must be in context and OUTWEIGHED by the OP's own progress. No hate towards men (or women).

This is a positive space for male progress and life outside women; as such, we do not want hateful or negative posts. We do not want to degenerate into a negativity echochamber.
If you want to vent, be angry, oher subs will cater to that.

2.  No Nazism or racism

3. No anime, cartoons or memes as submissions. This is primarily a space for genuine conversation and the sharing of practical information. We don't want it being drowned out by silliness.

4.Effort and Quality

5. Civility
data.description_html:
Are you a single man? Do you enjoy the single life? This sub is for you! Here is a place to discuss men's issues, single life, hobbies, fitness, style, independence, sex, and more...

  1. Keep the hate and angst to a minimum. Any mentions of female nature must be in context and OUTWEIGHED by the OP's own progress. No hate towards men (or women).

This is a positive space for male progress and life outside women; as such, we do not want hateful or negative posts. We do not want to degenerate into a negativity echochamber. If you want to vent, be angry, oher subs will cater to that.

  1. No Nazism or racism

  2. No anime, cartoons or memes as submissions. This is primarily a space for genuine conversation and the sharing of practical information. We don't want it being drowned out by silliness.

4.Effort and Quality

  1. Civility
data.name: SingleMen

data.description:
That one game where you die.

Also the other two games where you die, and the game where you die that came before the other games where you die. Also that one game that has guns and also you die, and the one where you die but don't, and most importantly of all that one game that everyone's going hollow waiting for.

---

The clusterfuck translates to: This is the guild for the Dark Souls trilogy, Demons' Souls, Bloodborne, Sekiro, and Elden Ring.

---

If someone makes +Bloodborne, +Sekiro, or +EldenRing, I'll plug those guilds here so discussion about those games can happen there instead.
data.description_html:
That one game where you die.

Also the other two games where you die, and the game where you die that came before the other games where you die. Also that one game that has guns and also you die, and the one where you die but don't, and most importantly of all that one game that everyone's going hollow waiting for.

The clusterfuck translates to: This is the guild for the Dark Souls trilogy, Demons' Souls, Bloodborne, Sekiro, and Elden Ring.

If someone makes +Bloodborne, +Sekiro, or +EldenRing, I'll plug those guilds here so discussion about those games can happen there instead.

data.description: The Legend of Zelda is a series of video games, typically about a boy named Link who has to rescue Princess Zelda from Ganon. Most are set in the kingdom of Hyrule, with themes like fighting, adventuring, item collecting, and puzzle-solving. The Zelda series has sold over 80 million games, making it the 20th best-selling video game series of all time.
data.description_html: The Legend of Zelda is a series of video games, typically about a boy named Link who has to rescue Princess Zelda from Ganon. Most are set in the kingdom of Hyrule, with themes like fighting, adventuring, item collecting, and puzzle-solving. The Zelda series has sold over 80 million games, making it the 20th best-selling video game series of all time.
